# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation for Synergy (or Equivalent) Server ISS Support and Maintenance

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: BPM021579/26763
* **Publication Date**: June 20, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: July 11, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Tender Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites bidders to submit a proposal for Synergy (or Equivalent) Server ISS Support and Maintenance services. This tender is for a period of one year, from August 5, 2024 to July 31, 2025.

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **End User Entities**: Shared Services Canada
* **Region of Opportunity**: Ontario (except National Capital Region), Canada
* **Region of Delivery**: Canada, Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Tender Submission Requirements

All bidders must attempt to submit their bids through the P2P portal. Submissions not permitted after Solicitation Closing. To register, please go to [P2P Portal](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) and click “Register Now”.

### Evaluation Criteria

Bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal to view, submit, and receive updates regarding solicitations.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders within the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) region.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Sandra Ladouceur
* **Contact Email**: [Not Provided]
* **Contact Phone**: 613-302-0766
* **Contact Fax**: 613-960-6026
* **Contact Address**: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1G 4A8
